Text:
Starman (TV Series 1986–1987)

Starman : Season 1 Episode 2  “Like Father Like Son” September 19, 1986

Although on the run from Fox in a newly purchased used car, Paul and Scott stop to help a woman who is having car trouble and is also on the run, having just kidnapped her own daughter.

VHS Master to Stand alone Recorder SP Speed to Ripped .mpg

Not out on DVD.
Sorry it shouldn't say "pilot" in the title.  The overlords here at PB will not even let you edit a simple title...
Hey DVDguy... I like your Starman episodes.  Would you happen to have them on VHS? I would be interested in purchasing copies from you, if you have no objections.  Please let me know.
